caption: A group of children sat outdoors on the ground, and a man stood in front of them. The children lined up, seemingly awaiting some arrangement. Then, the scene shifted to a courtroom, where five boys were seated on the bench, and the one on trial was a bespectacled boy. Suddenly, the boy in front of them turned into a beetle. The bespectacled boy fell to the ground and then reappeared on the classroom's podium. A boy from the audience rushed forward, pushing down the boy on the podium, eliciting cheers. Next, a boy wrote on the wall and was noticed by the teacher. A group of boys placed a box on the street, and one boy wrote on a table while a man watched. In the kitchen, there was a plate of lobsters, and a boy knelt in front of one. A woman carrying a garbage bag entered the kitchen. Later, the boy returned to the living room, where there were two men and a woman. Then, the boy went back to the kitchen.
